sub_title: Architect at Gortemaker Algra Feenstra - Architecture, development and research
summary:
Welcome to my Linkedin profile,

My name is Pieter Jan van Beelen, architect


As an architect it is my mission to make this world a little better than before. To do my best to work together with each persons unique qualities to create the best possible results for these complex tasks.

I am an architect experienced in working on large and logistically complex buildings, with an emphasis on health care, in the Netherlands and abroad. I have a deep knowledge of the intricate workings of e.g. hospitals, psychiatric hospitals, schools, laboratories, offices. My passion is the solving of complex questions asked by and working with the client and the future users of the building. 

It's important for me to analyze the clients questions, researching multiple possibilities to potentially reach unexpected solutions. By working together creatively with other specialisms i seek to incorporate the combined knowledge of the design team to devise integrated and sustainable design solutions. My strength lies in the overseeing of all aspects and interrelations e.g. construction, installation, implantation, landscaping, interior design of complex projects.

I am fluent in Dutch and English, and my German and French language skills are good. My computer skills include BIM, revit, arkey, photoshop, indesign, illustrator, all at fill professional level.

I work on various healthcare projects, as a project architect for the Sint Antonius Hospital and psychiatric hospital in Utrecht (honoured by the International Academy for Design and Health) and internationally as an architect on the hospital Jan Portaels in Vilvoorde (Belgium) and on the Next Generation Hospitals in Slovakia, and Grand Madica in Novokuznetsk in the Russian Republic.


pieterjanvanbeelen@gmail.com, 
+31651625646
